products.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Splash turquoise blue panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The mid blue, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Tiffany Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash tiffany blue panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This bright blue dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. products.title: Splash Sapphire Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash sapphire blue panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush dark blue panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its cool, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Voile Fr Cobalt Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue panel blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their voile cobalt blue panel is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, panel blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sapphire Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This lush, sapphure blue panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Brittany Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their brittany blue bella blackout panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.
